attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️✨🌸🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: Soo I got the app cus I wanted to see what all the fus was about being with the presidents app.  Ya know I wanted to see his plans and stuff even though I’m not a fan of the big orange 🍊.  But I did indeed hate the app it was taking up my storage and data and I did not like that.  Soo the president indeed has a terrible app and it deserves no good reviews it’s quite terrible.

attributes.title: horrible.
attributes.review: This app is pure BOOTY. i do not reccomend it to anyone. i downloaded to see what our ✨cheeto✨ president was planning todo. i started scrolling and all of a sudden i fainted. i had the wierdest dream that our ✨cheeto✨ of a president kidnapped me. He became a orange and started chasing me through a hall telling me to vote for him. Now i will not vote for him because of the traumatization that this app has given me. 0/5.

attributes.title: I wouldn’t trust this app Bc it may have a virus
attributes.review: This app is such trash I hate how it’s always lagging and how it constantly kicks me out it’s like it has a virus and honestly I don’t think you should it get it because after I downloaded it my phone started to mess up like if it gave my phone something so please don’t trust this app

attributes.title: REALLY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: honestly it’s upsetting me an my homegirls cause well dang if you can’t go to President Trump app where the heck can you go. The app was very slow and had me very disappointed. I was rlly hoping to support this app but apparently not😔. I just want to see what our wonderful orange president had in mind for the country but i can’t. i had many pressing ✨concerns✨

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Upon opening the app I quickly found that the entire app was based off of FAKE NEWS. How awful!!!! I couldn’t believe some of the things I was seeing- they couldn’t possibly be true! This entire app is a disgrace to the App Store and to REAL apps. Now I know that all apps matter but this one obviously DOESNT. Never again😡🤬😱

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Right after I downloaded this app strange things started happening to my house... just like many of the reviews said, strange things started happening.. trump 2020 started appearing all over my walls and floor and eventually I got very uncomfy and had to move :( anyways make sure to put a one star review and if you support trump please get therapy🥳💕

attributes.title: ✨disgusting ✨
attributes.review: I personally got this app to educate my self on what our wonderful president is doing but the app was full of lies . It said that trump is for women but I recall he said grab them by the 🐱. Which I find disgusting . I also  learned that he is racist , sexist , homophobia and xenophobic . Also the app is built wrong and showed a picture of a sex offender which i found to be triggering . DONT GET THIS APP .

attributes.title: ✨Not the right T app✨
attributes.review: I was looking for Tik Tok because I heard it was being banned. I wanted to see what all the fuss was about. I downloaded this app blindly because I was looking for a T and to my surprise I was greeted with an orange cheeto rather than funny videos and my info being stolen I’m very disappointed, can someone point me towards the correct app?!?!?

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: Anyway this app sucked. Really bad quality and trash. Crashed so many things. Also I got it because I wanted to know what’s up with our disgusting orange 𝙁𝘼𝙆𝙀 hair 𝙊𝙇𝘿  𝘼𝙎𝙎 president. But there wasn’t anything Interesting. So I hope you delete this app for good, because it’s not helping no one. And tbh this probably just stealing yalls Information but what Can i do?

attributes.title: Keeps freezing my phone
attributes.review: Rite when I go to open the app my phone continues to freeze on the opening page. It does not allow me to return to my home screen. Very rarely when I do make it past the loading screen it then takes it upon itself to close the app.
